name: umbrelos
description: Umbrel is a self-hosted OS and app platform for running personal servers. It provides a one-click app store for Bitcoin, Lightning, Nextcloud, and more, managed via an easy-to-use web dashboard.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Install apps with one click from a curated store including Bitcoin, Nextcloud, and media servers

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage your server and apps through an intuitive web interface accessible from any browser

features.title: App Management
features.description: Start, stop, and configure apps easily without command-line knowledge

features.title: User
features.description: Designed for non-technical users to run their own server without complexity

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Host your own services and data without relying on third-party cloud providers

features.title: Raspberry Pi Support
features.description: Run on affordable hardware like Raspberry Pi for low-cost self-hosting
